mapper.insert: insert into sm_user (organ_id, organ_code, organ_name, code, name, password, salt, phone, mail, level, verify_code, error_time) values (#{id}, #{organId}, #{organCode}, #{organName}, #{code}, #{name}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{phone}, #{mail}, #{level}, #{verifyCode}, #{errorTime})
mapper.update: update sm_user set organ_id = #{organId}, organ_code = #{organCode}, organ_name = #{organName}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, phone = #{phone}, mail = #{mail}, level = #{level}, verify_code = #{verifyCode}, error_time = #{errorTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, role_level, type from sm_role where id = #{id}
